column4: My opinions are -- Go with 9.04 -- I'd say 8.04 LTS is excellent for businesses that does not want to upgrade their linux system every 6 months.
thanks for the suggestion.  For not taking a risk of loosing data, Is an uprade better than a full install?
In theory, it should be same.  However, I always resort to full clean installation than upgrading because I have the tendency to try new things/packages all times. ^^
There you go.  elninja said it all.  BACKUP YOUR DATA. :)
